short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to send email/emails to your vacation bot

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your leave requests with the VismaTech Absence. This extension allows you to quickly and easily select your leave dates and send pre-formatted email requests directly to our VacationBot. Designed specifically for Visma employees, this tool ensures that your leave requests are accurate and effortlessly communicated.
